column4: we must not walk the path of the passwd crackers, so sayith the spider

fuck you man. if you've never tried freaking phreaking then you're a L0s5eR!!!!! the cold wind in your hair as you fumble with the wires, the rush of adrenaline as you get disconnected every 16 seconds... ah, the good ol' days :Ppp
well i had tried phreaking when i was in highschool or so; that wasn't so long ago and i live in greece. the phone system used to be easily absuseable. not now, anymore
